formalpara.title: Figure 8.
formalpara.para: The E4 and E8 Notch interactions in the intestinal primordium are illustrated in the top row. Cell in the intestinal primordium (circled in bottom panels) express REF-1 in the left E4, leading to the down-regulation of LIN-12 at the E8 stage. The E16 interaction then induces REF-1 expression in the right cells. Adapted from Neves and Priess (2005).
